description: Slavo Jarowsky is at a swimming pool when he sees Martin Valko.  Slavo swims past Martin to see if he is as hot close up.  Martin follows Slavo to the other end of the pool and right up into his hotel room.  Once inside his room Slavo can't get enough of Martin's beautiful cock and is fucked in multiple positions about the room.
title: Accidental Lovers, Scene #02
